author: dfraser
title: Manchester United’s Paul Pogba needs to stop messing around with his hair and social media, or end up a flop like Memphis Depay, says Ruud Gullit
text:
EFL You'll Depay for it Manchester United’s Paul Pogba needs to stop messing around with his hair and social media, or end up a flop like Memphis Depay, says Ruud Gullit 
Dutch ace warns former Juventus midfielder to focus on the game or end up a famous £89million Old Trafford failure By Dave Fraser
